name: The Global Conference on Education and Psychology
content: The Global Conference on Education and Psychology (GCEP 2015) is scheduled to take place in Beijing, China from August 12th\~14th 2015\. This conference aims to provide a communication platform for academics, researchers, graduates and industry professionals to not only present their recent and latest researches but also share their thoughts and discuss the future development in the field of global information and management. We sincerely invite contribution in the field of information and management. Papers submitted will be reviewed and notified in groups and in sequence.
